ygData.subject: Re: Sorry soulstice
ygData.msgSnippet: Razor Claw stood confused for the moment, he tried to show no weakness. He stepped forward and hurled his sword at Mobster. Is this supposed to impress me?

Razor Claw stood confused for the moment, he tried to show no weakness. He =
stepped forward and hurled his sword at Mobster. "Is this supposed to impre=
ss me?" he asked looking up at the bot he challenged. 
  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: SOULSTICE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, =
December 21, 2000 10:50 AM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


  Gigas didn't =
move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in his place now.

  Gigas: How abo=
ut this, I crush you, as Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.=


  Mobster switches voices.

  Kracken: But right now, we're Mobster...
  =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
    Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
    Subject: Re: Sorr=
y soulstice


    Razor Claw looked up at his attacker still showing no fea=
r, "That sounds like a challenge, Let's make this interesting, you knock me=
 down, I join your alliance, I knock you down, you surrender to the Maximal=
s, deal?" he stepped forward, pulled his left arm back and threw an upprcut=
 into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first."
      ----- Original Message ----- 
=
      From: SOULSTICE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday,=
 December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


      Giga=
s: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my best shot, but I =
didn't want to waste anything on you. In other words, I am not intimidated.=
 I have seen battles come and go, me taking the brunt of the attack, but i =
still stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know, you should join the All=
iance, it would do you a world of good.

      Gigas stayed planted to his =
spot, not moving an inch...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        F=
rom: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, D=
ecember 20, 2000 10:20 AM
        Subject: Sorry soulstice


        Sorry,=
 it must've been mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

        claw struck =
him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by =
the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, happy that he a=
gain came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judgi=
ng by the size of the Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas is a large, =
Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw
=

        Razor Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt l=
ike hell but Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to=
 be knocked back about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  =
at the attacker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your be=
st shot, I'd hate to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
          -=
---- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
          S=
ubject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help=
.


          OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
        =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
           =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31=
 AM
            Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three sh=
ould get help.


            Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the scee=
n of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mentally=
 reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three unti=
l they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pull=
ed his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to, =
your choice."

            He aproached the three bots ready for battle and=
 hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
              ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
              From: dachande 
              To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
              Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
            =
  Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


              ::Eclipse/Wolver=
itron/Ramus::
               
                  They had heard the battling=
 and decided to run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and =
Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they exited th=
e base, in beast modes. And headed far away.










        eGroups Spon=
sor
